alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 1:46AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Mazama, Entiat, Okanogan, Pangborn Airport, Inchelium, Twisp, Methow, Omak, Disautel Pass, Number 2 Canyon, Nespelem, Conconully, Boulder Creek Road, Republic, Wenatchee, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Winthrop, Brewster, Chesaw Road, Bridgeport, Sherman Pass, Number 1 Canyon, Chelan, Loup Loup Pass, Oroville, Tonasket, Wauconda, and Cashmere. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions during the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area; Western Okanogan County
